tool_description: Earn with AI Chatbots that inform or entertain!
name: MessengerX.io
title: MessengerX.io

api_list.name: Get Character Details
api_list.description: An endpoint to get basic details for a particular AI chatbot / character.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://messengerx-io.p.rapidapi.com/details/jeanie"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "messengerx-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://messengerx-io.p.rapidapi.com/details/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "messengerx-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: A paginated api to browse through the publicly available AI characters

api_list.name: Top / Trending AI
api_list.description: Top 25 AI characters / chatbots on the platform
